biotools.summary: Functional similarity database and web service for ranking genes/proteins by function. It provides different semantic similarity measures for Gene Ontology terms and offers functional similarity values for proteins contained in UniProtKB and for protein families/domains in Pfam and SMART. Users can perform semantic similarity searches with GO terms and functional similarity searches with proteins or protein families. It also supports prioritizing disease gene candidates.

bioschemas.name: FunSimMat
